name: Pasx.GitHub.com
body:
## Welcome to My Github Profile

DRY. Do not Repeat Yourself. The purpose of this repository is to provide reusable modules that can be simply and rapidly included in your JavaScript projects. I am creating

What I put here is often based on the work others and I give credits where appropriate. I spend quite some time refactoring and polishing the code as well as testing it as part of real world applications.

My development is based on JQuery, Angular, Ionic and Bootstrap. Server side is Node.js. I try to use existing proven libraries wherever possible.

I am creating those modules also as a way to master new techniques and technologies. So no doubt there is room for improvement there. Comments and support are welcome.

## Who I Am and What I Do

I am a software engineer and I have written code for a living for quite a while now. I do mostly C#, JavaScript and C++. And SQL, Java, assembly language, COBOL, Basic, Turbo-Pascal, you name it (:

I currently live in Devonport, Auckland, New Zealand.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
